name: D.I. Luke Warm
description:
You play as D.I. Luke Warm solving crimes with pin boards.

Read the instructions to get to grips with how to play. The game is best experienced in full screen.

How to play:

  1. Open the case book by selecting it at the bottom of the screen.
  2. When you find an important person or place, click on their image to drag them to the board.
  3. Move people and places around by clicking and dragging their images.
  4. If multiple entries on the board exist you can connect them by selecting their pins.
  5. To cancel a connection click on the pin at the start of the rope, to remove a pre-existing connection connect the two pins up again.
  6. The Officer will tell you if your connection is good or bad.
  7. Once you believe you have a solid case, click on the radio to contact the Captain.
  8. Make sure to build up all the connections before contacting the Captain.

Good luck D.I.

This game was originally submitted to the Lost Relics Jam.
